channel.title: RSMimic [rs2dv]
channel.description:
So I started a new project called RSMimic.
Im using the source rs2dv. I believe that this is a GREAT source. Programmers have not taken advantage of this source, and shook it off their shoulders because of their sheer laziness.
Not to fear, I am starting to develop a RuneScape 317 CLONE. I am going to create full copy of the old RuneScape, using the beautiful Rs2DV Framework.
Progress: Added Item Dropping Capability Added Teleporting (Working on GFX)
Currently working on: Importing NPC's Importing Items Adding Magic GFX
Pics:

item.title: RSMimic [rs2dv]
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:9, topic:317596”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=414106.msg3050062#msg3050062 date=1260036952]

The reason people don’t use this is because they would rather use a different frame work like Hyperion or shard, or another very good frame work that lots of people use.

too many people are doing this

What? this is the first project Ive seen that is using rs2dv as its frame work.

I meant remaking rs2. Theres been billions of projects started, and only Thing1’s is acutally making progress.
[/quote]

Scape-java got his head in his ass now, and I’m making a version of RuneScape right before the more modern gameframe and sideicons came out. It’s going great but I CBA to post a devo.

Gl though, rs2dv ftw :)[/quote]

Thats not his project, it’s thing1’s. All he does is edit .cfg files lool

Read full topic

item.title: RSMimic [rs2dv]
item.dc:creator: @Ackroma Ackroma
item.description:
@Ackroma wrote:

Well there is “Paragon”, which is far ahead of me and coming along beautifully.

But, however, I doubt paragon will be released.
I WILL be releasing this.

I have a few tricks that will keep leachers away, but that time is far from now.
